item.title: Javascript runtime là gì ?
item.description: A javascript runtime is an environment which provides all the necessary components Components of JavaScript Runtime JavaScript Engnine Web API  Callback Queue Microtask Queue In order to use and run a javascript program.  Js code may be executed in one of two runtime enviroments: The runtime environment of a browser (like chrome or firefox) The Node runtime environment.
